author: Cat Pea <corporate.miou@gmail.com> (https://catpea.com/)
name: bashscript
description: A small and minimalist REPL shell, and a very lightweight JavaScript library meant to convert Operating System commands to functions.

scripts.bork: git add .; git commit -m 'New Release'; git push; npm publish; git push;
scripts.save: git add .; git commit -m 'New Release'; git push; npm version patch; npm publish; git push;
